response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs and exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience significantly. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, we believe its true worth is $12,000. However, to make this opportunity more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this proposal carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this product to you.", "product_price": 9500}
